data.title: Israeli Victim of Rave Massacre Buried Outside Cemetery Due to Incomplete Conversion to Judaism - Israel News - Haaretz.com
data.meta_description: 'She Was Murdered as a Jew' | Because She Has Not Yet Completed Her Course for Converting to Judaism, Alina Falahati, Who Was Killed at the Nova Music Festival on October 7, Was Refused Burial in a Jewish Cemetery. 'It Was an Error,' Says an Israeli Rabbinate Official
